snippet: Bill de Blasio’s latest 30-second commercial, “Change This City,” ties Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg to Park Avenue, Wall Street and other signifiers of elitism.
abstract: Bill de Blasio’s latest 30-second commercial, “Change This City,” ties Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg to Park Avenue, Wall Street and other signifiers of elitism.

headline.main: The Ad Campaign: De Blasio's Message of 2 Cities, Again
headline.print_headline: The Ad Campaign: De Blasio’s Message of 2 Cities, Again
